description: The military branch said last week that the unnamed aviator recently notched the achievement against an attack drone deployed by Yemen’s Houthi rebels.
title: A Navy pilot becomes the first woman aviator to kill an air-to-air contact in combat

description: Filmmaker David Leitch says it's easier to do stunts himself than direct his stunt performer friends. "You are responsible for their safety," he explains. "Your heart goes through your chest."
title: A former stunt performer walks away (mostly) unscathed from fist fights, flipped cars

description: Vice President Kamala Harris appears on a glidepath to being nominated for president when delegates meet in Chicago next month, after endorsements from top Democratic lawmakers, organizers, and potential rivals.
title: Potential rivals to Harris for president line up to endorse her

description: James, 39, is a three-time Olympic medalist. A fourth this summer would put him in a tie for most medals won by a U.S. men's basketball player. The female U.S. flag bearer will be announced Tuesday.
title: LeBron James to be the U.S. male flag bearer at the Paris Olympics opening ceremony

description: Kimberly Cheatle was subpoenaed to appear before the House Oversight Committee following the shooting at Trump’s western Pennsylvania rally July 13.
title: Secret Service chief to Congress: 'We failed'

description: In her fierce second novel, Sarah Manguso writes a requiem for a failed relationship from the point of view of a survivor, the wife left behind.
title: 'Liars' is an autopsy of a bitterly disappointing marriage

description: European leaders list Biden's accomplishments while in office in recognizing the difficult decision he made. Zelenskyy praises Biden's support during Ukraine's "most dramatic moment in history."
title: European allies praise Biden's decision to step aside

description: Aegon catches on to Aemond's power plays. Plus: Alicent shows symptoms of maternal instinct.
title: 'House of the Dragon' Season 2, Episode 6: A blind date goes down in flames
